trans-unit.source: A token handler for encrypted security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 加密安全性權杖的權杖處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Handles tokens of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" /> 型別的權杖。

trans-unit.source: A token handler that serializes and deserializes <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken> objects from `<xenc:EncryptedData>` elements and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> objects from `<xenc:EncryptedKey>` elements as defined in the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210).
trans-unit.target: 序列化和還原序列化的權杖處理常式<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken>物件從`<xenc:EncryptedData>`項目和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause>物件從`<xenc:EncryptedKey>`XML 加密語法和處理規格中所定義的項目 (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityTokenHandler" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityTokenHandler" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element.
trans-unit.target: 位於開始項目的 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: The reader should not be advanced.
trans-unit.target: 不應該將讀取器向前移。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current XML element is pointing to an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> element that can be deserialized to a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值指出目前的 XML 項目是否指向 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> 項目，此項目可以由這個執行個體還原序列化成<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the XML reader is positioned at an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> element as defined in section 3.5.1 of the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 讀取器位於 XML 加密語法和處理規格的章節 3.5.1 (http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210)) 所定義的 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> 元素，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The reader positioned at a security token (<see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> element.)
trans-unit.target: 讀取器位於安全性權杖 (<see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" />項目)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the reader is pointing to an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出讀取器是否指向 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reader is positioned at an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位於 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Does not move the reader when it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當它傳回時，不會移動讀取器`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the handler provides serialization functionality for tokens.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出處理常式是否提供語彙基元的序列化功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handler can serialize tokens; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果處理常式可以序列化權杖，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type identifier URIs for tokens handled by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前執行個體所處理的語彙基元的型別識別項 URI。

trans-unit.source: By default, returns an array with a single <see langword="null" /> string because there is not a specific token type identifier that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會傳回含有單一 <see langword="null" /> 字串的陣列，因為沒有與 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" /> 型別相關聯的特定語彙基元型別識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer" /> that will be used to serialize and deserialize key identifiers from the <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer" />，它會用來序列化和還原序列化 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedData>" /> 項目中的金鑰識別項。

trans-unit.source: The token serializer that will be used to read and write key the key identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 將用來讀取和寫入金鑰識別項的權杖序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <see langword="null" /> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將屬性設為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> element as defined in 'http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210'; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: XML 讀取器，位於 'http://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmlenc-core-20021210' 中所定義的 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> 元素；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads an <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> from an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: 從 XML 資料流讀取 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" />。

trans-unit.source: A key identifier clause of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> 型別的索引鍵識別項子句。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is not positioned at an <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 並不是放置在 <see langword="<xenc:EncryptedKey>" /> 項目上。

trans-unit.source: The reader from which to read the token.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中讀取語彙基元的讀取器。

trans-unit.source: Reads an encrypted security token.
trans-unit.target: 讀取加密的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: A security token of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" /> 型別的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There is no configured service token resolver.
trans-unit.target: 沒有設定的服務權杖解析程式。

trans-unit.source: (Either the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property or the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.ServiceTokenResolver" /> property of the referenced token handler configuration is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: (所參考之語彙基元處理常式組態的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> 屬性或 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.ServiceTokenResolver" /> 屬性是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A service token resolver is required to obtain keys for decryption.
trans-unit.target: 必須有服務語彙基元解析程式才能取得解密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection" /> referenced through the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection" /> property is unable to find a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> that can read the decrypted XML and return a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 經由 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection" /> 屬性所參考的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection" /> 找不到 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> (其可以讀取解密的 XML 並傳回 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> is not found inside the XML pointed to by the reader.
trans-unit.target: 在讀取器所指向之 XML 內部找不到 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> found inside the XML cannot be resolved by the configured service token resolver to a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML 中找到的<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" />無法由所設定的服務權杖解析器解析成<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the token handled by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前執行個體所處理的權杖類型。

trans-unit.source: The token type handled by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體所處理的權杖類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="typeof" /><see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<see langword="typeof" /> <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML writer to which to write the encrypted token.
trans-unit.target: XML 寫入器，要將加密的權杖寫入至其中。

trans-unit.source: The encrypted security token, must be an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 加密的安全性權杖，必須是<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Writes an encrypted security token using the XML writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XML 寫入器，寫入加密的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="token" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is not assignable as <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 <paramref name="token" /> 指派為 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is required for obtaining keys for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 必須要有這個屬性才能取得用於加密的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The token handler collection returned by the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection" /> property was unable to find a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> that can write the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" /> returned by the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken.Token" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.ContainingCollection" /> 屬性所傳回的權杖處理常式集合無法找到 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" />，其可以寫入 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" /> 屬性所傳回的 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedSecurityToken.Token" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials.SecurityKey" /> property is not assignable as <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials.SecurityKey" /> 屬性不可指定為 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey" />。
